content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"So, you have created a new event, filled out its details, designed its Pages for a great look at Events Portal, and fine-tuned Additional Options, Notifications, and General settings.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Just one step is left to get it published. Only one category of users is entitled to publish or unpublish events—the Super Users. You will have to ask these Events Portal gods for their approval.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Publish event\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(26, 156, 176)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Not later than four days before the start of your event, get its design approved by \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFTBusinessDeskEventsPortal@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFT Business Desk Events Portal\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". If your event meets all requirements, it will be published by them.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When the Super Users hit the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Publish\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" button, a Draft event changes its status to Published and becomes visible for the Events Portal visitors.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Unpublish (withdraw) event\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(26, 156, 176)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If something goes wrong or your event is canceled, you may need to withdraw the event from Events Portal. Contact the same people (the Super Users mentioned above) to do it. After an event is unpublished, it becomes Draft again.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
